title: Delivery Allocation System
description: Delivery allocation system to deliver orders to the customers via delivery partners. This project was built using Spring Boot and H2 in memory database.

title: Vectorization of bitmaps
description: Google summer of code 2019 project to develop an option for Synfig to perform vectorization of bitmap/raster images using an algorithm(s) of vectorization from OpenToonz.

title: Actor Quiz
description: AuthorQuiz App is a Beginner Web Application. After learning the basics of Reactjs. This project was bootstrapped with create-react-app.

title: Salvador- A Space Adventure
description: A 2D action adventure game in which you fight alien creatures and collect keys to save our planet from destruction!

title: Smart kaksha
description: A smart classroom app made for students and teachers for better interaction

title: Algorithm Visualizer
description: A full stack project built using Java, JavaScript, and PostgreSQL. Algorithm Visualizer is an application to learn algorithms through visual animations. It provides a platform for viewing data structures and algorithms in action.
